title: Defining urban boundaries through DBSCAN and Shannon's entropy: The case of the Mexican National Urban System
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 149

Author(s): Camilo Alberto Caudillo-Cos, Jorge Alberto Montejano-Escamilla, Rodrigo Tapia-McClung, Felipe Gerardo Ávila-Jiménez, Itzia Gabriela Barrera-Alarcón
